document_data.caption: A razor and cap.
document_data.name: Razor and Cap
document_data.mainbody: A '''razor and cap''' was a pair of religious items in the Realms often carried by [[cleric]]s who used them to shave their heads.
document_data.Description: The leather caps were made in [[Ordulin]] and ensured the shave was uniform each time by leaving a perfect circle exposed where the hair would be shaved with the razor.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 4 [[gold piece]]s and included a leather case for the razor.
document_data.Notable Users: * Razors and caps were favored by clerics and [[priest]]s.
